Protegiendo tu privacidad y manteniendo: Protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of your data is our priority.

Cancha de fútbol de primer nivel, ubicad: Top-level football field located in the main stadium of Las Palmas. Synthetic and natural grass, ideal for professional matches and large-scale sporting events. It features locker rooms, night lighting, and spacious stands for the public.
Instalaciones de baloncesto en el Polide: Basketball facilities at La Paterna Sports Complex, with several outdoor and indoor courts. Perfect for basketball games with friends or local tournaments. The court has a high-quality surface, night lighting, and seating areas for spectators.
Ubicada en el barrio de La Isleta, esta: Located in the La Isleta neighborhood, this synthetic grass field is ideal for casual matches and training. It has night lighting and resting areas. Its calm atmosphere makes it a perfect place to enjoy football.
El Parque Deportivo Zardo es un complejo: Zardo Sports Park is a football and multi-sport complex with synthetic grass. It offers extensive facilities for matches and training, with locker rooms and resting areas. Additionally, it features a children's play area and recreational spaces.
Una cancha de baloncesto al aire libre,: An outdoor basketball court located in the famous Santa Catalina Park. Perfect for enjoying a great game with views of the sea and the city. It features stands and shaded areas for spectators.
Estadio principal de la ciudad, sede de: Main stadium of the city, home of UD Las Palmas, with a capacity for 33,070 spectators. Ideal for high-level football matches and major sports events.
Pabellón cubierto de baloncesto, sede de: Indoor basketball arena, home to ACB League games. The perfect place to enjoy high-level basketball games. It also hosts sports events and concerts.
Un campo de fútbol accesible para el púb: A football field accessible to the public, with high-quality synthetic grass. The perfect place for casual matches, training sessions, and local leagues. Well-located and easily accessible.
Este complejo deportivo tiene varias can: This sports complex features several football fields with artificial turf, accessible to the local community. It's one of the preferred spots for training and recreational matches.
